Source.Name: navi
Source.Summary: An interactive cheatsheet tool for the command-line and application launchers
Source.Description: Navi allows you to browse through cheatsheets (that you may write yourself or download from maintainers) and execute commands

Package.Name: navi
Package.Summary: An interactive cheatsheet tool for the command-line and application launchers
Package.Description: Navi allows you to browse through cheatsheets (that you may write yourself or download from maintainers) and execute commands
